articles.title: IRL: Founder of collapsed social media site charged with fraud - BBC.com
articles.description: US authorities allege Abraham Shafi made misleading statements to investors about IRL's growth.
articles.content:
It is alleged he and Barbara Woortmann spent hundreds of thousands of dollars on personal expenses, including clothing, home improvements and travel.
